about_the_game:
A scene from an original virtual reality story by Tomis Fras.

Medusa is a story about two Croatian actors, adapting to a rapidly changing industry. From acting in plays at the Croatian National Theatre to acting in motion capture suits for a major Hollywood studio. They explore themes of artistic integrity, cultural identity and learning to cope with uncertainty.

In this 10 minute Room-scale VR experience, you’ll join them for a conversation over coffee at the canals of ‘A-Studios’.



This piece is a solo-devoloped passion project - fully voiced and mocaped in Croatian with English subtitles.

Context: this is a proof of concept for a full three Act Medusa VR Film - this scene is from Act 2 Scene 5 of Medusa. Should you be interested in ever seeing the full VR film come to life, feel free to comment in the reviews.

To find out more about the behind-the-scenes of Medusa VR or see more of my work visit my website.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 1500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8GB RAM or more GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or higher
  • VR Support: Oculus Touch Controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-11800 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 32GB+ RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: Oculus Touch Controllers

short_description: Medusa, the Croatian word for jellyfish. Medusa VR is 10 minute solo-developed VR film. Join Russel and Zlatan - two Croatian actors in Califonia for a coffee by the canal as they discuss grief, change and loss. When on strange shores, would you swim with Medusas?
